head.supplied: 31/5/86 ¶ ¶ Could you kindly inform me, dear Dr Hector, in the interest of antarctic exploration, whether any fish are known from Auckland-, Campbell- and Macquarie-Island, which could be salted or s...

div.p: No. 86/257, Box 79, James Hector, correspondence received, Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa Archives, Wellington.

Could you kindly inform me, dear Dr Hector, in the interest of antarctic exploration, whether any fish are known from Auckland-, Campbell- and Macquarie-Island, which could be salted or smoked for food.
